channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- .NET Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- .NET Core

item.title: CVE-2020-0605|2024-08-04T06:11:04.584Z -- microsoft -- .net%20core
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in .NET software when the software fails to check the source markup of a file.An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user, aka '.NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0606.

item.title: CVE-2020-0606|2024-08-04T06:11:04.403Z -- microsoft -- .net%20core
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in .NET software when the software fails to check the source markup of a file.An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could run arbitrary code in the context of the current user, aka '.NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0605.

item.title: CVE-2020-1108|2024-08-04T06:25:01.017Z -- microsoft -- .net%20core
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when .NET Core or .NET Framework improperly handles web requests, aka '.NET Core & .NET Framework Denial of Service Vulnerability'.
